title: LF Friendly Club
body:
Hey guys,

Relatively new player, about 3 months experience about to step foot into the ranked world. I'm a little tired of being griefed by the random PUGs I get grouped up with, banning my champs in the champ select screen, intentionally feeding, and generally acting like massive jerks.

I'd really prefer to play with a friendly and chill group of people, who just want to have fun playing the game and not getting caught up in what is probably the most toxic gaming environment I've ever seen.

Looking forward to playing with you.
